```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(crosstalk)
library(DT)
```

```{r}
quake<-read_csv("data/earthquakedata.csv")
```

# leaflet

##

### Tabla
```{r}
quake %>%
  filter(yr==1995) %>%
  datatable()
```

### Mapa

```{r}
quake %>%
  filter(yr==1995) %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lng=~lon,
             lat=~lat,
             label=~mag)
  
```



# crosstalk

```{r}
shared_quake<- SharedData$new(quake %>% filter(yr>2000))
```
